Little_Rock.Barth-Hempfling House: The Barth-Hempfling House is a historic house at 507 Main Street in North Little Rock, Arkansas. It is a single-story wood frame structure, five bays wide, with a side gable roof and vernacular Late Victorian styling. It was built in 1886 for German immigrants, and is the last surviving house on Main Street in downtown North Little Rock, an area that was once lined with similar houses.
